summary.para: Defines different offset settings of submenus relative to their parent menu items.
Initializes a new instance of the ItemSubMenuOffset class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ItemSubMenuOffset.X

summary.para: Gets or sets the horizontal offset of a submenu relative to its parent menu item which is neither the first nor the last item at its menu level.

member.value: An integer value specifying the horizontal offset of a submenu.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ItemSubMenuOffset.Y

summary.para: Gets or sets the vertical offset of a submenu relative to its parent menu item which is neither the first nor the last item at its menu level.

member.value: An integer value specifying the vertical offset of a submenu.

summary.para: Specifies how the border is displayed between a menu item and its submenu.
The border between a menu item and its submenu is not displayed for all menu items.
The border between a menu item and its submenu is not displayed for root menu items but is visible for all subitems.
The border between a menu item and its submenu is displayed for all menu items.
Specifies the manner in which a specific separator is displayed to separate menu items from each other.
Specifies that separators are automatically displayed at all menu levels to separate menu items from each other.
Specifies that separators are not displayed automatically. In order to display a separator before a particular menu item, the item's property should be used.
Specifies that separators are automatically displayed only at the root menu level to separate the root menu items from each other.
Defines style settings for the client regions of submenus.
Initializes a new instance of the MenuStyle class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxPopupMenu.PopupVerticalOffset

summary.para: Gets or sets a popup menu's vertical offset.

member.value: An integer value that specifies a popup menu's vertical offset.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxPopupMenu.Top

summary.para: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the popup menu's top side.

member.value: An integer value specifying the y-coordinate of the default popup menu's top side.

summary.para: Represents the base class for menu controls of the and types.
Initializes a new instance of the ASPxMenuBase class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.AllowSelectItem

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether items can be selected within a menu control.

member.value: true if items can be selected; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.SubMenuItemImage

summary.para: Gets the settings of a common image which is displayed by all submenu items of the current menu control.

member.value: An object that contains image settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.SubMenuItemStyle

summary.para: Gets the style settings for all submenu items within the current menu control.

member.value: A object that contains the style settings for the menu's submenu items.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.SubMenuStyle

summary.para: Gets the style settings for the client regions of all submenus within the current menu control.

member.value: A object that contains the style settings for the client regions of the menu control's submenus.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.SubMenuTemplate

summary.para: Gets or sets a common template used for displaying the client region's content of all submenus within a menu control.

member.value: An object supporting the System.Web.UI.ITemplate interface which contains the template used for displaying the client regions of all submenus within the menu.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.SyncSelectionWithCurrentPath

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the menu item whose navigation location points to the currently browsed web page is automatically selected.

member.value: true if a menu's selected item is automatically synchonized with the currently displayed page's path; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.Target

summary.para: Gets or sets the window or frame at which to target the contents of the URLs associated with all links within a menu control.

member.value: A string which identifies the window or frame at which to target the URL content.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.VerticalPopOutImage

summary.para: Gets or sets the settings of a pop-out image that is displayed in a vertically oriented menu's menu item when it has a submenu.

member.value: An object that contains the image settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.AppearAfter

summary.para: Gets or sets the delay in displaying submenus within the menu control.

member.value: An integer value that specifies the time interval, in milliseconds, after which submenus get displayed within a menu control.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.AutoPostBack

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether server-side processing is required for specific predefined user actions.

member.value: true, if server-side processing is required, otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.AutoSeparators

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies the manner in which a specific separator is displayed to separate menu items from each other.

member.value: An enumeration value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.BorderBetweenItemAndSubMenu

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the border is displayed between a menu item and its submenu.

member.value: One of the enumeration values.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.ClientSideEvents

summary.para: Gets an object that lists the client-side events specific to the menu.

member.value: A object which allows to assign handlers to the client-side events available to the menu.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.DisappearAfter

summary.para: Gets or sets the duration for which a dynamic menu (an item's submenu or a popup menu) is displayed after the mouse pointer is no longer positioned over the menu.

member.value: The length of time (in milliseconds) a dynamic menu is displayed after the mouse pointer is no longer positioned over the menu.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.EnableClientSideAPI

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the menu can be manipulated on the client side via code.

member.value: true if the menu's client object model is fully available; false if no programmatic interface is available for the menu on the client side.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.EnableHotTrack

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether menu items of a menu control can visually respond to mouse hovering.

member.value: true if the menu's items can be hot-tracked; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.GutterBackgroundImage

summary.para: Gets a gutter's background image.

member.value: A object that represents a gutter's background image.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.GutterColor

summary.para: Gets or sets a gutter's color.

member.value: A object that specifies a gutter's color.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.GutterWidth

summary.para: Gets or sets a gutter's width.

member.value: A System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit value specifying the width of a gutter.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.HasVisibleItems

summary.para: Returns a value that indicates whtether a menu control has visible root items.

member.returns: true if the menu contains any visible root item; false if there are no visible root items within the menu (or there are no items at all).

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.HorizontalPopOutImage

summary.para: Gets or sets the settings of a pop-out image that is displayed in a horizontally oriented menu's menu item when it has a submenu.

member.value: An object that contains the image settings.

summary.para: For internal use only.
Fires after a menu item has been clicked.
Fires when a control contained within a templated menu item raises the Command event.
Occurs after a menu item has been bound to a data source.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.ItemImage

summary.para: Gets the settings of a common image which is displayed by all the menu items within the current menu control's root level.

member.value: An object that contains image settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.ItemLinkMode

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies how menu items are represented as links within the menu control.

member.value: One of the enumeration values.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.Items

summary.para: Gets a collection that contains menu items of the menu's root level.

member.value: A that contains the root level menu items of the current menu control.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.ItemSpacing

summary.para: Gets or sets the amount of space between the menu items of the root menu level.

member.value: A that represents the spacing value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.ItemStyle

summary.para: Gets the style settings for all menu items of the menu control's root level.

member.value: A object that contains the style settings for the root menu items.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.ItemSubMenuOffset

summary.para: Gets specific offset settings for submenus of the submenu items.

member.value: An object that contains specific offset settings for submenu items' submenus.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.ItemTemplate

summary.para: Gets or sets a common template used for displaying the content of all menu items within a menu control.

member.value: An object supporting the System.Web.UI.ITemplate interface which contains the template used for displaying the content of all menu items within a menu.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.ItemTextTemplate

summary.para: Gets or sets a common template used for displaying the text content of all menu items within a menu control.

member.value: An object supporting the interface which contains the template used for displaying the text content of all menu items within a menu.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.LinkStyle

summary.para: Gets an object that contains style settings to be applied to links in a menu control.

member.value: A object that contains the style settings of links.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.MaximumDisplayLevels

summary.para: Gets or sets the number of menu levels to render for a menu control.

member.value: The number of menu levels to render for a menu control.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.Paddings

summary.para: Gets the padding settings of a menu control.

member.value: A object that contains padding settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.RootItem

summary.para: Gets the root item of the menu.

member.value: A object representing the root menu item.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.RootItemSubMenuOffset

summary.para: Gets specific offset settings for submenus of the root menu items.

member.value: An object that contains specific offset settings for the root menu items' submenus.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.SelectedItem

summary.para: Gets or sets the selected menu item within a menu control.

member.value: A object representing the selected item.

summary.para: Gets a separator's background image.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.ShowPopOutImages

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether pop-out images that indicate that a menu item has a submenu are displayed.

member.value: true to display for the menu items with submenus; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenuBase.ShowSubMenuShadow

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a submenu casts a shadow.

summary.para: Represents a menu control.
Initializes a new instance of the ASPxMenu class.

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies how item images are positioned within the menu's items.

member.value: One of the enumeration values.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxMenu.ASPxMenu.Orientation

summary.para: Gets or sets the direction in which to render the menu control.

summary.para: Specifies the direction in which to render a menu control.
The menu control is rendered horizontally.
The menu control is rendered vertically.
